Workflow.Name: ReviewHub - Scorecard Auto-Creation
Workflow.Description:
This flow creates all necessary records in all dataverse tables that are responsible for storing information related to a scorecard, such as metric information, comments, and product and metric specific information.
The failure of this flow would result in scorecards for the months in which it failed not being created, i.e if it fails in December, information about November scorecards would not exist in the Review Hub application.
